commit.message:
Fix lst_update_scattering.

2010-09-09  Sebastian Pop  <sebastian.pop@amd.com>

	* graphite-poly.h (lst_update_scattering_seq): Removed.
	(lst_update_scattering): Correctly handle outermost loop dewey
	renumbering.

From-SVN: r164801
